sources.title: Mega Time Squad (TIME TRAVEL ADVENTURE full film, comedy films German complete, action films 2022)

metadata.Plot: A small-town crim finds an ancient Chinese time-travel device that can help him pull off a heist and start a new life-but he may not survive the consequences of tampering with time. The Castle meets Looper, Mega Time Squad is a study in high-meets-low, combining elements of the sci-fi, the crime thriller and the comedy to make a comedy heist film with a time-traveling twist.
metadata.Actors: Anton Tennet, Jonny Brugh, Hetty Gaskell-Hahn
